sql.if: AND ( data LIKE "%" #{searchValue} "%" OR column_name LIKE "%" #{searchValue} "%" OR title LIKE "%" #{searchValue} "%" )

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM beauty_schema_columns t1 LEFT JOIN information_schema.`COLUMNS` t2 ON t2.COLUMN_NAME = t1.column_name WHERE t2.TABLE_SCHEMA = (SELECT dict_value FROM beauty_dict WHERE dict_key = 'schema') AND t2.TABLE_NAME = #{tableName} AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM beauty_table_columns WHERE column_id = t1.id)
mapper.insert:
insert into beauty_schema_columns
id,
data,
column_name,
title,
remark,
create_time,
creater,
last_update_time,
modifier,
is_deleted,
def1,
def2,
def3,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{def1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{def2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{def3,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update beauty_schema_columns
data = #{data,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
column_name = #{columnName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
def1 = #{def1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
def2 = #{def2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
def3 = #{def3,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
